shri lankawe sama purawasiyekuma pilibanda eekabaddha mulika thorathuru paddhathiyak godananwamin, jiwana siduwimwala karyakshama ha wishwasawantha liyapadinchi kirim paddhathiyak nirmanaya karamin, janagahana rejistaraya bhawitha karamin rajaye aayathana samaga thorathuru bedahada ganima ihala nanwamin, janawikasamaya ha saukhya sankhyalekhanawalata adala wada wisthirana wishleshanathmaka hakiya sapayamin ha jiwana siduwim warthakaranaye aawaranaya ihala nanwamin siyalu purawasiyan sandaha upathedi pudgalika handunaganime ankayak nikuth kirime aramuna athiwa ‘i -janagahanaya’ handunwa denu labe.

1956 di pilip gunawardhanayange wiplawakari sama samaja pakshaya ha ekwa, mahajana eksath peramuna godanaga ewaka pawathi ejapayath, wamanshika pakshath parajaya karamin aanduwak pihituwimata bandaranayaka mahatha samath wuwa sema, 1964 dith, 1970 dith lanka sama samaja pakshaya ha shri lankawe komiyunist pakshaya pramukha wamanshaya ha ekwa aandu pihituwimata sirimawo bandaranayaka mathiniya pramukha shrilanipayath pelambaima thulin ‘samajawadi’ lebalaya dadi karaganimata men ma ejapayata wikalpaya lesata peni sitimata da awasthawa uda wini.

me sandaha pradeshiya deshapalana nayakayin, krushikarma ha gowi janasewa adhyakshawarun pradhanathwaya darana athara, mita, danuwath kirime wadasatahan, palathuru pala beda dima, bija arthapal beda dima, mahiyanganaya hela bojun hala wiwrutha kirima, sampath bedadime uthsawaya, poshanaya ha aahara surakshithathawaya, pasu aswanu pradarshanaya, dansalak pawathwima ha aashirwada bodhi pujawak ha seth pirith deshanawak pawathwima aadi katayuthu rashiyak sanwidhanaya kara atha.
